{"id":551124776,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 1 week","timestamp":1631046762,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"172 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/551124776/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Perfect Squares","memory":"9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int numSquares(int n) {\n        vector<int> dp(n + 1, INT_MAX);\n        \n        if(n <= 3)\n            return n;\n        \n        dp[0] = 0;\n        dp[1] = 1;\n        dp[2] = 2;\n        dp[3] = 3;        \n            \n        for(int i = 4; i <= n; i++)\n        {\n            for(int j = 1; j * j <= i; j++)\n                dp[i] = min(dp[i], 1 + dp[i - j * j]);\n        }\n        \n        return dp[n];\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"perfect-squares"}
